mediaDetails.ext_alt_text:
duckdb -c "
  SELECT
      DATE(timestamp) AS date,
      SUM(CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'input_tokens' AS INTEGER)) AS input_tokens,
      SUM(CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'output_tokens' AS INTEGER)) AS output_tokens,
      SUM(
          CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'input_tokens' AS INTEGER) +
          CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'output_tokens' AS INTEGER)
      ) AS total_tokens,
      ROUND(SUM(costUSD), 2) AS cost_usd,
      FORMAT('{:,}', CAST(ROUND(SUM(costUSD) * 150, 0) AS INTEGER)) || 'å††' AS cost_jpy
  FROM read_json('~/.claude/projects/**/*.jsonl')
  GROUP BY DATE(timestamp)
  ORDER BY date DESC;
"

photos.accessibilityLabel:
duckdb -c "
  SELECT
      DATE(timestamp) AS date,
      SUM(CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'input_tokens' AS INTEGER)) AS input_tokens,
      SUM(CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'output_tokens' AS INTEGER)) AS output_tokens,
      SUM(
          CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'input_tokens' AS INTEGER) +
          CAST(message -> 'usage' ->> 'output_tokens' AS INTEGER)
      ) AS total_tokens,
      ROUND(SUM(costUSD), 2) AS cost_usd,
      FORMAT('{:,}', CAST(ROUND(SUM(costUSD) * 150, 0) AS INTEGER)) || 'å††' AS cost_jpy
  FROM read_json('~/.claude/projects/**/*.jsonl')
  GROUP BY DATE(timestamp)
  ORDER BY date DESC;
"
